## webpack-stats-report package

A library for generating a markdown report for a bundle stats diff

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createReport(bundleStatsResults, minimumIncrease)](./webpack-stats-report.createreport.md) | Generates a bundle size report from webpack bundle stats diff |
|  [getAppName(filePath)](./webpack-stats-report.getappname.md) | Returns the app name from webpack bundle stats filepath |
